phrases: Do not worry about it... do not worry about it.
So what if you get humiliated, or if they all laugh at you?
It is not like they are going to abandon you.
After all, you are not Beethoven.
And of course, you are not Chopin, either.
Are you ready to go on your journey?
Here he comes from the right!
So Watari ended up losing, too...
We gave it our best shot, did not we?
Come on, we got to go shake hands.
Well, I missed my chance at becoming a star.
So the rest is up to you!
Let us play again in high school, okay?
So I will have to wait till high school to become a star, huh?
No way am I going to lose next time, all right?
Watari and Tsubaki... their last junior high tournaments have ended.
I am at the point where I can play my selection by heart.
Do I have a deep understanding?
Have I made Chopin my own?
Somewhere in this music that follows these notes...
Where exactly are you in all this?
Your body is an important asset!
What was I supposed to do?
I was totally immersed, you know.
I felt better after I ate the egg sandwiches Tsubaki gave me.
There is a park over there, so...
She would eat my candy whenever I was not looking,
I was fooling around with Chelsea like always.
One day, she scratched my hand.
The blood was gushing, and would not stop...
The next day, my mother took her somewhere and abandoned her.
I am doing this for you.
The scars Chelsea left me remind me of my mother.
Who knew one of my few memories would be something like this?
I just stared at my mother's back without a word as she took Chelsea away.
Stop it! or Wait a minute...
If I would say something like that, things might have been different.
Ever since that day, I have been in my mom's shadow.
You also like Moo Moo Brand milk.
Unexpectedly, you have a sweet tooth, too.
You are not good at sports.
You are no match for Tsubaki-chan,
and you are a little bit jealous of that chick-magnet, Watari.
You are not in your mother's shadow at all.
To be like you... - it is not so ambiguous as that.
No matter what you do, no matter how you change, it does not mean a thing.
You are just you, no matter what.
You and I were not born in Europe, and we do not have weird haircuts.
We are not Chopin, after all.
Just play with sincerity, give the performance of your life with everything you have got.
You really have a way with words sometimes.
Listen, I am encouraging you here!
When you are depressed, it always helps to lean your head on your arms.
They are the hands of a pianist...
Your hands are happy to be touching mine.
They are beside themselves, itching to play the piano!
After struggling, losing my way, and suffering...
The answer I arrived at was so laughably simple...
You still cannot hear the notes, can you?
But see, there is this girl, and she seriously believes in the power of music.
So I think I will try believing in it, too.
That is not really an answer.
I am sure that person will come, too.
You should take it easy today.
Tomorrow's going to be a big day for you.
Well, I will be going, then!
You are going the wrong way!
Is he going to be okay?
Kochel number 265, Mozart's Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star.
The stars will shine over your head.
But I thought I was in the zone...
My child did not qualify again.
I feel bitter, but they were outstanding.
They were head and shoulders above the rest.
The sheer amount of practice they have put in is obvious.
This was the fruit of all those lessons.
That makes it all the more disappointing.
Kousei Arima Emi Igawa Takeshi Aiza
Because it makes Arima-kun look that much better.
So they served as Arima-kun's foils yet again, right?
He really pisses me off, that Arima!
Because we lost to him again?
I am just setting the stage to win the final.
He went home without even looking at the results, like he just assumed he would won!
I mean, would it kill him to look the least bit happy?
That in itself pisses me off!
Not in other people, and not in us.
You sure are cool about it.
I have never been humiliated like this before.
If he has no interest in us,
then I am going to force him with all my might to look our way.
I am going to destroy you...
He looks a little more grown up.
Those annoying black-rimmed glasses are the same.
Not a lot of people here, huh?
For a preliminary round, this is a pretty big turnout.
It could be the Arima-kun Effect.
Just now, in the restroom, all everybody could talk about was Kousei.
He is a really big deal, huh?
Why are you acting so smug, Tsubaki?
But listen, this vibe I am getting is kind of weird.
Is he going to show off his mind-blowing technique again?
Exactly as the score's written, totally under his mother's thumb,
Do people hate Kousei or something?
To follow the score, and to play exactly as the composer intended.
Now that is an incredible feat.
In a competition, they can only judge you for that,
but he can actually win just by being faithful to the score.
He can actually raise the bar...
That is what does not sit well with people.
Especially the younger generation, who seek out something from music.
Needless to say, there is jealousy, too.
I mean, Arima-kun did storm his way through all those competitions.
There was a time when he entered a lot of them!
I think it was around the time his mother was hospitalized.
Like a digital watch, never off by even a split second...
The name Kousei Arima is infamous!
I am going to kick his butt!
Damn that Arima, he is totally forgotten us!
You have an early start time, right?
And besides, it is not like Arima forgot us.
He never knew us from the start.
He is exactly the same as he was two years ago.
Just because his mother as a famous instructor's student,
he got all that special treatment...
But for someone with all those skills,
he never plays anything but boring music!
The first time I met him was in third grade.
Next time, for sure... next time, for sure...
And just when I thought I had him, after stretching out my arms all the way...
Like a mirage, he faded into the distance.
He was like the dove in a magic trick - poof, he was gone.
Today, finally, he is returned to where he belongs.
I have been waiting for this day for two years.
The competition is about to begin.
I hate judging because it is so exhausting.
No. 3, Miss Yuko Kawanaka, please get ready.
It is going to be all right.
Is it because it is been two years?
I have never gone through this before.
Like a broken see-saw, my heart's pounding like crazy...
Did he forget how to play?
I am scared, I am scared, I am scared...
I am scared, I am scared, I am scared...
I am scared, I am scared, I am scared...
Maybe they will totally reject you.
You grit your teeth and get up onstage anyway.
Is it just me... or is there a different vibe in here now?
The overwhelming favorite to win just took the stage.
Now I can finally listen to the real deal!
I will not be going to Germany.
I am going to enter the Maihou Music Competition.
This is a golden opportunity to get overseas exposure before the Chopin competition.
You already won Maihou last year, so there is no reason to make it a priority...
